plot: A young priest has his world torn upside down when his ex-girlfriend returns to Dallas to ask him to marry her (to his best friend, nonetheless).
plot_en: A young priest has his world torn upside down when his ex-girlfriend returns to Dallas to ask him to marry her (to his best friend, nonetheless).
plot_es: A young priest has his world torn upside down when his ex-girlfriend returns to Dallas to ask him to marry her (to his best friend, nonetheless).
title: La ley del silencio
